description: CSS file implementing theme management with light and dark modes for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main application container with text alignment and background color management.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Logo styling including size and animation for the app logo.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header styling encompassing layout, background color, and text properties.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling theme with styling for responsiveness and interaction.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframes for spinning animation of the app logo.
